com.hazelcast.spi.serialization

Interface SerializationService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    InternalSerializationService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSerializationService, SerializationServiceV1

    public interface SerializationService
    SPI to serialize user objects to Data and back to Object Data is the internal representation of binary data in hazelcast.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ManagedContext getManagedContext()
      see Config.setManagedContext(ManagedContext)
      <B extends Data> 
      B      		 toData(Object obj)
      Serializes an object to a Data.
      <B extends Data> 
      B      		 toData(Object obj, PartitioningStrategy strategy)
      Serializes an object to a Data.
      <T> T toObject(Object data)
      Deserializes an object.

    • Method Detail

      • toData

        <B extends Data> B toData(Object obj)
        Serializes an object to a Data.

        This method can safely be called with a Data instance. In that case, that instance is returned.

        If this method is called with null, null is returned.

        Parameters:
        obj - the object to serialize.
        Returns:
        the serialized object.
        Throws:
        HazelcastSerializationException - when serialization fails.

      • toData

        <B extends Data> B toData(Object obj,
                        PartitioningStrategy strategy)
        Serializes an object to a Data.

        This method can safely be called with a Data instance. In that case, that instance is returned.

        If this method is called with null, null is returned.

        Parameters:
        obj - the object to serialize.
        strategy - strategy is used to calculate partition id of the resulting data see PartitioningStrategy
        Returns:
        the serialized object.
        Throws:
        HazelcastSerializationException - when serialization fails.

      • toObject

        <T> T toObject(Object data)
        Deserializes an object.

        This method can safely be called on an object that is already deserialized. In that case, that instance is returned.

        If this method is called with null, null is returned.

        Parameters:
        data - the data to deserialize.
        Returns:
        the deserialized object.
        Throws:
        HazelcastSerializationException - when deserialization fails.

      • getManagedContext

        ManagedContext getManagedContext()
        see Config.setManagedContext(ManagedContext)
        Returns:
        ManagedContext that is set by user in Config
